apple_legacy_recovery.name: Apple Legacy Software Recovery CD
apple_legacy_recovery.description: The October 1999 Apple Legacy Recovery disc is a bootable CD with Mac OS 7.6.1 and software for classic Apple computers and peripherals.

marathon_trilogy.name: Marathon Trilogy
marathon_trilogy.description: Classic sci-fi first-person shooter trilogy by Bungie - Marathon, Marathon 2: Durandal, and Marathon Infinity.

game_pack_2.name: Game Pack 2
game_pack_2.description: Classic LucasArts adventure games: The Secret of Monkey Island, Monkey Island 2: LeChuck's Revenge, and Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis. All games have copy protection removed for easy play.

myst.name: Myst
myst.description: Myst, the surrealistic adventure that becomes your world, offers a first-person perspective, stunning 3-D photorealistic graphics and an original sound track as players seek to untangle a web of deceit.

simcity4delux.name: SimCity 4 Deluxe
simcity4delux.description: A city-building simulation game that combines the original SimCity 4 with the Rush Hour expansion pack, allowing players to sculpt landscapes and build and manage an entire region of interconnected cities.

simcity3000.name: SimCity 3000
simcity3000.description: A city-building simulation game allowing players to sculpt landscapes and build and manage an entire region of interconnected cities. Needs PPC and Mac OS 7.6.1 to 9.x

macos_x_tiger.name: Mac OS X Tiger 10.4
macos_x_tiger.description: Mac OS X 10.4 Tiger installation disc.

macos_x_leopard.name: Mac OS X Leopard 10.5.6
macos_x_leopard.description: Mac OS X 10.5.6 Leopard installation disc - the last version of Mac OS X to support PowerPC Macs.
macos_x_leopard.filename: Mac OS X Leopard Install DVD Version 10.5 (2Z691-6037-A) (Apple, Inc.)(2007).iso

warcraft2.name: Warcraft II
warcraft2.description: Warcraft II: Tides of Darkness, a classic real-time strategy game.

stuffit_expander_55_img.name: StuffIt Expander 5.5 (IMG)
stuffit_expander_55_img.description: StuffIt Expander 5.5 - Free decompression utility for Mac OS in IMG disk image format, capable of expanding StuffIt archives and many other compressed file formats.

stuffit_expander_55_dsk.name: StuffIt Expander 5.5 (DSK)
stuffit_expander_55_dsk.description: StuffIt Expander 5.5 - Free decompression utility for Mac OS in DSK disk image format, capable of expanding StuffIt archives and many other compressed file formats.

simtower.name: SimTower - The Vertical Empire
simtower.description: SimTower (1994) - Build and manage a towering skyscraper, balancing residential spaces with commercial facilities and essential services. Master elevator management to keep occupants happy as you progress through a star-rating system. Supports System 6.x through Mac OS 9.

simcity2000.name: SimCity 2000
simcity2000.description: SimCity 2000 - The classic city-building simulation game where you design, build, and manage your own metropolis.

stuffit_deluxe_501.name: StuffIt Deluxe 5.0.1
stuffit_deluxe_501.description: StuffIt Deluxe 5.0.1 - Professional compression and archiving utility by Aladdin Systems. Features advanced compression algorithms, archive management, and resource fork handling for Mac files. Registration key: DLXF-0835-nnn225 where nnn is any number between 001 and 999 (e.g., DLXF-0835-123225).
